entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Prince Edward (Picton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:15 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 6:25 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: ENE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers or drizzle beginning in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy mixed with drizzle changing to snow before morning. Rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High zero. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
